attributes.action: Have a crossing put next to our Childrens school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My son, and obviously many others attend Beddington Infants School in Wallington, Surrey. We have NO form of crossing next to the school. There is a crossing down the road somewhat. This is outside a Secondary school, and is a full traffic light crossing. Surely Nursery and Infant children 3 years + need some form of crossing, even if it is a zebra crossing a lot more than older children

We always do our best to encourage children to use a crossing and be safe. This school is on a major road, and people will cross in the middle of the road if there is no alternative.

Please help our children to stay safe!!!
